$description: Shadow and elevation tokens for depth and layering. Shadows communicate hierarchy and interactivity.

low.description: Low elevation. Subtle lift from surface.

hover.description: Shadow for hover state. Slight lift.

pressed.description: Shadow for pressed state. Compressed feel.

primary.description: Primary color glow. For primary buttons and active elements.

error.description: Error color glow. For error states.

success.description: Success color glow. For success states.

subtle.description: Subtle inset shadow. Pressed inputs, recessed areas.

medium.description: Medium inset shadow. Text inputs, wells.

zIndexScale.description: Z-index scale for layering. Use these values to ensure correct stacking order.

direction.description: Shadows fall downward, as if light comes from above. Y-offset should be positive.

color.description: Use neutral black shadows by default. Consider tinted shadows (using brand color with low opacity) for a warmer feel.

darkMode.description: In dark mode, reduce shadow opacity or use lighter shadows. Consider using subtle borders instead of shadows.
